game.name: Paid in Blood
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A psychological suspense gambling game. You're trapped into a dark room. Boyfriend's dead. The $1,000,000 you stole: destroyed. There's an IV in your arm hooked to a handheld Baccarat game. Your debt will be paid. In blood.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A psychological suspense gambling game. You're trapped into a dark room. Boyfriend's dead. The $1,000,000 you stole: destroyed. There's an IV in your arm hooked to a handheld Baccarat game. Your debt will be paid. In blood.
